Double Punch/Injector/Manterror/Counter Punch:



Double Punch fired two missiles at the back of Stegotron's left knee.

---

Beeline dived, firing an optic blast at Triceradon's left arm.

---

Counter Punch stumbled back, slamming through a tree and landing face first 
into mud.

---

Manterror slowly got up.  Looking to Dark Mouse, he headed for the foilage, 
retreating.

---

Injector got behind a tree, shots digging into it quickly.  Sliding to the 
side, he fired two stinger missiles at Ultracon, an optic blast at Dark 
Mouse's side.
